item.title: Volkswagen’s ID EVs faltered in the U.S.—now it’s banking on a revived American brand
item.description: As EV sales cool, VW looks to a defunct brand Scout for U.S. growth.

item.title: Three McKinsey chief diversity and inclusion officers argue that the biggest issue facing women at work is the ‘broken rung’
item.description: McKinsey’s Lareina Yee and two fellow senior partners are behind the new book The Broken Rung.

item.title: Trump’s tariff showdown is making workers nervous. Here’s how HR leaders should talk about it at the office
item.description: Workers across industries are concerned that Trump’s tariff policy could lead their company to lay off workers.

item.title: Alphabet CFO offers bullish view of Waymo as the future of transportation
item.description: Waymo develops self-driving technology and operates autonomous vehicles.

item.title: Who runs Tesla: The top power players at Elon Musk’s biggest company
item.description: All the top executives that Musk has installed at his EV pioneer.
